snippet.textDisplay:
In a dog's eyes, you can see the purest & unconditional love, coming straight from its soul;  that's why your soul, will always see them like your family, your best friend, & your 4 legged daughter or son. ğŸ¾ğŸ’œğŸ¾ Don't give a f*** what others think about you; The heart of a person can be judged by the way he/she loves them. The same as a Nation can be judged by the way it's animals are treated. Loving the most amazing creatures on earth, it's a privilege! A House without a Dog... is not a Home... S.
